metadata.title: CVE-2022-28203 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: A denial-of-service issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.6, 1.36.x before 1.36.4, and 1.37.x before 1.37.2. When many files exist, requesting Special:NewFiles with actor as a condition can result in a very long running query.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
